metadata.title: 5347-1 -- OpenVPN vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenVPN incorrectly handled certain configurations with multiple authentication plugins. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass authentication using incomplete credentials.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5347-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  openvpn - 2.5.1-3ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
